mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.VERSION, A.TOPIC_NAME, A.COMMENTS, A.CREATER, A.CREATE_TIME, A.CUSTOM1, A.CUSTOM2, A.CUSTOM3, A.CUSTOM4, A.CUSTOM5,TC.FORUM_COUNT RELATED_FORUM_COUNT FROM FORUM_TOPIC A LEFT JOIN (SELECT TI.TOPIC_ID, COUNT(*) FORUM_COUNT FROM TOPIC_INCLUDE TI GROUP BY TI.TOPIC_ID) TC ON A.ID = TC.TOPIC_ID WHERE A.ID = #{Id}

SELECT FT.ID, FT.VERSION, FT.TOPIC_NAME, FT.COMMENTS, FT.CREATER, FT.CREATE_TIME, FT.CUSTOM1, FT.CUSTOM2, FT.CUSTOM3, FT.CUSTOM4, FT.CUSTOM5, TC.FORUM_COUNT RELATED_FORUM_COUNT FROM FORUM_TOPIC FT LEFT JOIN (SELECT TI.TOPIC_ID, COUNT(*) FORUM_COUNT FROM TOPIC_INCLUDE TI GROUP BY TI.TOPIC_ID) TC ON FT.ID = TC.TOPIC_ID ORDER BY TC.FORUM_COUNT DESC LIMIT #{0}, #{1}
SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS CHAR) FROM FORUM_TOPIC A
